FuncDef:
The weight command sets a weight value for a GQ.
The undo weight command restores the default setting.
By default, the weight value of GQ is 10.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a weight value.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 63.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the case of traffic congestion, the weight command can be used to set weight values for GQs so that the GQs can be scheduled based on the weights.
